item.description:
Join Santa Claus Anonymous at the 25th Anniversary SnowBall, which has become Boston’s largest all-volunteer-run black-tie charity event with hundreds of volunteers and thousands of guests. All proceeds raised from the SnowBall are donated to annually-selected youth programs in Greater Boston. This event is a lot of fun!

Don't miss the kick off party to the holiday season! Tickets are at a discounted rate of $55 for General Admission until October 31. After, the price increases to $65.

Purchase your tickets today! - http://scaboston.org/snowball/tickets/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near ticket area. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: 25th Annual Snowball, Boston's Biggest Charity Holiday Event. Discounted Tix
